# Getting Started

## Installing and Loading Packages

```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, sfdep, tmap, tidyverse)
```

## Import data sets

### Aspatial data

```{r}
hunan2012 = read_csv("data/aspatial/Hunan_2012.csv")
head(hunan2012)
```

### Geospatial data

```{r}
hunanGeo = st_read(dsn = "data/geospatial",
                   layer = "Hunan")
glimpse(hunanGeo)
```
